document_data.name: Owl's Wisdom
document_data.mainbody: '''''Owl's wisdom''''' was a [[transmutation]] [[spell]] that temporarily boosted a creature's insight.
document_data.Effects: The caster had to touch the recipient of this spell. When cast, the target creature's wisdom was greatly enhanced for a time that increased with the caster's skill.
document_data.Components: This spell had [[verbal]], [[somatic]], and [[material component]]s in the form of [[owl]] feathers or droppings. When the spell was cast as [[divine magic]], the caster needed a [[divine focus]] instead of the aforementioned material component.
